message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of your product, $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $85 for it.
I understand that $120 was a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $105. I think you'll find it's a fair price for a great product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $105 is still a bit high for me. I'm happy to pay $95 for it. This is a fair price considering I could purchase the same product from someone else for $80.

I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you at $110, which is still a good compromise considering the value of the product. I'm confident you'll find it's worth it.
